                              Checkers
All Implemented Interfaces:
acm.io.IOModel, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer
public class Checkers
extends acm.program.GraphicsProgram

Este código utiliza a biblioteca ACM Java Task Force para a qual existe esta documentação.

Esta classe é um exemplo de um "GraphicsProgram": um programa com uma janela na qual é possível desenhar objectos gráficos.

Este template para o BlueJ foi criado na Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão do Instituto Politécnico de Beja, por Joao Paulo Barros, em 2007/03/23. Esta é a versão de 2008/09/28.

Version:
03-11-2010
Author:
Miguel Rosa (Nº 6219)
See Also:

Constructor Detail

Checkers

Method Detail

drawBasicBoard

public void drawBasicBoard(int N_COLUMNS,
                           int N_LINES,
                           int POS_X,
                           int POS_Y,
                           int squareWidth,
                           int squareHeight)
This method draws the basic board (a grid) and paint it with chess pattern

Parameters:
N_COLUMNS - numbers of columns of the board (this value never change - constant)
N_LINES - number of lines on the board position of X (this value never change - constant)
POS_X - position of X (this value never change - constant)
POS_Y - position of Y (this value never change - constant)
squareWidth - width size of the square
squareHeight - height size of the square
pieceWidth - width size of the piece
pieceHeight - height size of the piece
squareSize - total size of the square, square of the board

drawBlackPiece

public void drawBlackPiece(int POS_X,
                           int POS_Y,
                           int squareWidth,
                           int squareHeight,
                           int pieceWidth,
                           int pieceHeight,
                           int squareSize)
This method draws the basic black piece (requirement 2 - essential).

Parameters:
POS_X - position of X (this value never change - constant)
POS_Y - position of Y (this value never change - constant)
squareWidth - width size of the square
squareHeight - height size of the square
pieceWidth - width size of the piece
pieceHeight - height size of the piece
squareSize - total size of the square, square of the board

drawBoard

public void drawBoard(int N_COLUMNS,
                      int N_LINES,
                      int POS_X,
                      int POS_Y,
                      int squareWidth,
                      int squareHeight,
                      int pieceWidth,
                      int pieceHeight,
                      int squareSize,
                      int option)
This method draws all the components (board, pieces and labels (letters and numbers)). Basically, this method calls all the "main sub-methods": (drawBasicBoard, drawLettersAndNumbers, drawPieces and drawInvertedPieces).

Parameters:
N_COLUMNS - numbers of columns of the board (this value never change - constant)
N_LINES - number of lines on the board position of X (this value never change - constant)
POS_X - position of X (this value never change - constant)
POS_Y - position of Y (this value never change - constant)
squareWidth - width size of the square
squareHeight - height size of the square
pieceWidth - width size of the piece
pieceHeight - height size of the piece
squareSize - total size of the square, square of the board
option - option selected by the user

drawBottomPiece

public void drawBottomPiece(int POS_X,
                            int POS_Y,
                            int squareWidth,
                            int squareHeight,
                            int pieceWidth,
                            int pieceHeight,
                            int squareSize)
This method draws the piece with image, ie image instead of two GOval. This sub-method draw de bottom pieces

Parameters:
POS_X - position of X (this value never change - constant)
POS_Y - position of Y (this value never change - constant)
squareWidth - width size of the square
squareHeight - height size of the square
pieceWidth - width size of the piece
pieceHeight - height size of the piece
squareSize - total size of the square, square of the board

drawInvertedBlackPiece

public void drawInvertedBlackPiece(int POS_X,
                                   int POS_Y,
                                   int squareWidth,
                                   int squareHeight,
                                   int pieceWidth,
                                   int pieceHeight,
                                   int squareSize)
This method draws the basic black piece with the inverted color (on this case, with white color (requirement 8 - not essential)).

Parameters:
POS_X - position of X (this value never change - constant)
POS_Y - position of Y (this value never change - constant)
squareWidth - width size of the square
squareHeight - height size of the square
pieceWidth - width size of the piece
pieceHeight - height size of the piece
squareSize - total size of the square, square of the board

drawInvertedPieces

public void drawInvertedPieces(int N_COLUMNS,
                               int N_LINES,
                               int POS_X,
                               int POS_Y,
                               int squareWidth,
                               int squareHeight,
                               int pieceWidth,
                               int pieceHeight,
                               int squareSize,
                               int option)
This method draws all the inverted color of the pieces (call the sub-methods drawInvertedBlackPieces and drawInvertedWhitePieces)

Parameters:
N_COLUMNS - numbers of columns of the board (this value never change - constant)
N_LINES - number of lines on the board position of X (this value never change - constant)
POS_X - position of X (this value never change - constant)
POS_Y - position of Y (this value never change - constant)
squareWidth - width size of the square
squareHeight - height size of the square
pieceWidth - width size of the piece
pieceHeight - height size of the piece
squareSize - total size of the square, square of the board
option - option selected by the user

                                   int POS_Y,
                                   int squareWidth,
                                   int squareHeight,
                                   int pieceWidth,
                                   int pieceHeight,
                                   int squareSize)

                        int squareWidth,
                        int squareHeight)
this methos draw the numbers on left side of the board

Parameters:

drawPieceImages

public void drawPieceImages(int N_COLUMNS,
                            int N_LINES,
                            int POS_X,
                            int POS_Y,
                            int squareWidth,
                            int squareHeight,
                            int pieceWidth,
                            int pieceHeight,
                            int squareSize)
This method draws imagens in place of the pieces. To drawing the images, this method calls the 2 sub-methods: drawTopPiece (to draw the top pieces) and drawBottomPieces (to draw the bottom pieces).

Parameters:
N_COLUMNS - numbers of columns of the board (this value never change - constant)
N_LINES - number of lines on the board position of X (this value never change - constant)
POS_X - position of X (this value never change - constant)
POS_Y - position of Y (this value never change - constant)
squareWidth - width size of the square
squareHeight - height size of the square
pieceWidth - width size of the piece
pieceHeight - height size of the piece
squareSize - total size of the square, square of the board

drawPieces

public void drawPieces(int N_COLUMNS,
                       int N_LINES,
                       int POS_X,
                       int POS_Y,
                       int squareWidth,
                       int squareHeight,
                       int pieceWidth,
                       int pieceHeight,
                       int squareSize)
This method draws all the pieces (calls the sub-methods drawBlackPieces and drawWhitePieces)

N_COLUMNS - numbers of columns of the board (this value never change - constant)
N_LINES - number of lines on the board position of X (this value never change - constant)

POS_Y - position of Y (this value never change - constant)
squareWidth - width size of the square
squareHeight - height size of the square
pieceWidth - width size of the piece
pieceHeight - height size of the piece
squareSize - total size of the square, square of the board

                         int POS_Y,
                         int squareWidth,
                         int squareHeight,
                         int pieceWidth,
                         int pieceHeight,
                         int squareSize)
